name: Ping Pong Demo Project
description:
A prototype of what pong would be like if you could move in 2 dimensions. Focused especially on the game juice.

An older project of mine, was originally going to be a full game. But after some time in development i kinda lost interest.

I decided to upload the project now, as i was really happy with the game-juice, sound design, AI and the technical architecture i had built. As i tried to resume development i found it really hard to read my code and rather decided to polish it a bit, and upload the game as a prototype.

Note: if anyone using GMS2 ever wanted to use the code for this project, just go ahead and DM me.
